jsrun:
cpu_index_using: physical
rank: 0: { host: node1; cpu: {0}; gpu: {0}}

results.script:
# task environment
export RP_SESSION_ID=test_sid
export RP_PILOT_ID=test_pid
export RP_AGENT_ID=test_aid
export RP_SPAWNER_ID=exec.0000
export RP_UNIT_ID=unit.000000
export RP_UNIT_NAME="task.0000"
export RP_GTOD="None"
export RP_PILOT_STAGING="./"
export RP_PROF="/tmp/unit.000000.prof"

prof(){
    if test -z "$RP_PROF"
    then
        return
    fi
    event=$1
    now=$($RP_GTOD)
    echo "$now,$event,unit_script,MainThread,$RP_UNIT_ID,AGENT_EXECUTING," >> $RP_PROF
}


prof task_start

# ------------------------------------------------------
# task sandbox
mkdir -p /tmp
cd       /tmp


# task pre-exec
prof task_pre_start
test_pre_exec ||  (echo "pre_exec failed"; false) || exit

prof task_pre_stop


# task execution
prof task_exec_start
some_exe 1>unit.000000.out 2>unit.000000.err 

RETVAL=$?
prof task_exec_stop

# task post-exec
prof task_post_start
test_post_exec ||  (echo "post_exec failed"; false) || exit
prof task_post_stop

exit $RETVAL
# ------------------------------------------------------
